name: <iter::adapters::flatten::Flatten<I> as iter::traits::double_ended::DoubleEndedIterator>::try_rfold
src:
fn try_rfold<Acc, Fold, R>(&mut self, init: Acc, fold: Fold) -> R
    where
        Self: Sized,
        Fold: FnMut(Acc, Self::Item) -> R,
        R: Try<Output = Acc>,
    {
        self.inner.try_rfold(init, fold)
    }
